channel.title: How to IP Ban Users? I dont have a bannedips.txt
channel.description: I looked for it in tuts but i couldn't find. I need to know how to IP ban users. My server does not have the command for it, and I would like someone to help. Thanks!

item.title: How to IP Ban Users? I dont have a bannedips.txt
item.dc:creator: @AARisAIR AARisAIR
item.description:
@AARisAIR wrote:

Well you could get another source and add the appendtobannedip method to your current source.

item.title: How to IP Ban Users? I dont have a bannedips.txt
item.dc:creator: @Zoo_York_Skate Zoo York Skate
item.description:
@Zoo_York_Skate wrote:

93dcthugs93 I get one error:

client.java:11660: cannot find symbol
symbol : method appendToBannedIP(java.lang.String)
location: class client
appendToBannedIP(p.connectedFrom);
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: How to IP Ban Users? I dont have a bannedips.txt

item.title: How to IP Ban Users? I dont have a bannedips.txt
item.dc:creator: @AARisAIR AARisAIR
item.description:
@AARisAIR wrote:

[quote=“bumbumlongtime, post:3, topic:59189”][quote author=AARisAIR link=topic=84841.msg908619#msg908619 date=1171672401]
Which source are you using? Most sources should have it under /data/, go to client.java and search for bannedips.txt, if you have that and most sources do, it should work. Create a bannedips.txt in the data folder and test it.
[/quote]

you dont do that…
go to client.java search for
“ipbanuser”
or
“ipban”
if u havent got one of them in the thing i would say u would need to add the commands to
client.java…[/quote]

I’d say most people would have what I posted…all the new servers do at least.

Read full topic
item.source: How to IP Ban Users? I dont have a bannedips.txt

item.title: How to IP Ban Users? I dont have a bannedips.txt
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

IP Ban command

if(command.startsWith("ipban") && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("93dcthugs93"))) { String victim = command.substring(6); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim); if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; appendToBannedIP(p.connectedFrom); } System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is IPbanning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully IPbanned"); }

Read full topic
